properties.name: Big Bear Hill
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is the perfect place to go sledding in the Winter, and the perfect place for water fights in the Summer. I partook in many of both.

properties.name: Condell Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is where I had to go for x-rays and a cast after I broke my wrist.

properties.name: Denny's
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is the Denny\'s we would go to for late night eating. It was pretty much a necessity after a big school sporting event.

properties.name: Hawthorn Mall
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is the mall where I used to hang out a lot in Jr. High and most of Freshman year.

properties.name: Lake Charles Park
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is the park where me and my friends would hang out growing up. This was before we had cars and could go to places that were farther away.

properties.name: My Cabin
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman A vacation cabin my family has up in Wisconsin. It is one of my favorite places to be. It is right on a lake and has many local mom n\' pop shops to enjoy. Very relaxing.

properties.name: My Home
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman The house I moved to in 3rd grade. I met all of my good friends that I still have to this day while living in that house. I lived there through part of elementary and all of middle and high school.

properties.name: My Old House
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman The house I lived in before moving to Vernon Hills in the 3rd grade. I used to pick the crab apples in the front yard before school.

properties.name: Nassau, Bahamas
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is where I went for my Senior year spring break. It was a fantastic experience. I stayed at the Atlantis Resort.

properties.name: Natalie's House
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman My girlfriend\'s house. She is the love of my life and that fact still remains to this day.

properties.name: Ralph's House
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman My best friends house. I spent large amounts of time here growing up. I can usually be found here while visiting home.

properties.name: Ralph's Old House
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is where my best friend used to live. I spent a majority of my middle school days here.

properties.name: St. Kitts
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is where I went for my Junior year spring break. It was an extremely fun time, the weather was great the entire trip.

properties.name: The Hidden Pond
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is a place I would walk to when I needed to get away and just think for a while. It\'s really relaxing.

properties.name: The Skate Park
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman Spent a lot of time here during High School. It was a great place to come and hang out with a lot of kids.

properties.name: Vernon Hills High School
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman This is where I went to High School. The school part was boring but I enjoyed the social aspect.

properties.name: White Deer Run Golf Course
properties.description: Posted by Jroberman The golf course visible from my backyard. I would sled down its hills in the Winter and go golfing on it in the Summer.
